Artist Douglas Coupland wants your head</title><description>Somewhere out there is a gaunt redhead who is the spitting image of Vincent van Gogh &#8212; and Douglas Coupland is going to find him, scan him and immortalize him in bronze.</description><source>Entertainment</source><pubDate>Wed, 22 Jun 2016 00:21:02 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/12001359.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Do you look like Vincent van Gogh? Unlike the Clownfish that hooked audiences in Finding Nemo, the Blue Tang that stars in Finding Dory doesn&#8217;t do well in [&#8230;]</description><source>Entertainment</source><pubDate>Tue, 21 Jun 2016 04:48:56 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/11999491.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /><a10:link rel="external" type="text/html" title="Don't buy a real Blue Tang if you love Finding Dory, fish experts advise" href="http://vancouversun.com/news/local-news/dont-buy-a-real-blue-tang-if-you-love-finding-dory-experts-advise" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=11996827</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/star+trek+actor+anton+yelchin+dies+crash/11996827/story.html</link><title>SUV that rolled, killed 'Star Trek' actor is under recall</title><description>LOS ANGELES, Calif. - The SUV that rolled down a driveway and killed "Star Trek" actor Anton Yelchin was being recalled because the gear shifters have confused drivers, causing the vehicles to roll away unexpectedly, government records show.</description><source>Entertainment</source><pubDate>Tue, 21 Jun 2016 03:10:04 Z</pubDate><enclosure url="http://www.theprovince.com/cms/binary/11996837.jpg" type="image/jpeg" /></item><item><guid isPermaLink="false">tag:www.theprovince.com:content=11996842</guid><link>http://www.theprovince.com/entertainment/celebrity/anton+yelchin+dies+freak+accident+actor+best/11996842/story.html</link><title>Anton Yelchin dies in freak accident at age 27: Actor best known for Star Trek role killed by own car</title><description>The rising actor was killed by his own car as it rolled backward down his driveway, police said. It pinned him against a brick mailbox pillar and a security fence</description><source>Entertainment</source><pubDate>Sun, 19 Jun 2016 22:47:38 Z</pubDate><enclosure and Sara on their pop identity and their hope after Orlando</title><description>Art can heal in times of grief.
